page.title: 12CASTLEHILL PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: {Castlehill Primary School is one of {the largest schools in Fife.}It was opened in 1976.It is semi open plan and has 6 areas each with 4 rooms.Each room has 1 sink but the areas have 2. There is 1 headteacher, 3 assistant heads,27 teachers and 659 pupils. At the{old Castlehill school,}history, geography,nature study,sewing and art were taught as separate lessons.In the old school there were big old classrooms,no carpets on the floor and some classrooms were upstairs and in the basement.The{new Castlehill School is totally different from the old school.
